what_you_do: Amy Lee Flower has a multifaceted approach to creating unique wellness and meditation programs.
who_you_serve: She works with children, teens, women, & families.
social_proof: She has taught these skills to over 30,000 students, educators, and families. She has led practices for over 500 principals & administrators.
business_focus: Creating unique wellness and meditation programs for children, teens, women, and families.
